attributes.action: Self employed to receive UK average wage with immediate effect
attributes.additional_details: As employed people are already recieving help of up 80% of their wage, persons who are self employed should also receive immediate help as many are left in big trouble financially with rent and other expenses still active. Governments recent plans to help the self employed will still leave people in financial trouble especially with the scheme coming into effect from June. The best was and the fastest is to look at the UK average wage and apply that figure to self employed persons.
attributes.background: Pay self employed people the UK average wage to help house holds meet financial commitments during the pandemic crisis.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303345

Since you started your petition the Government has announced support for self-employed individuals: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/chancellor-gives-support-to-millions-of-self-employed-individuals

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
